summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Infobip bot calling application. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI working correctly with all required features. Infobip integration is LIVE and working - API calls to /tts/3/advanced endpoint returning 200 OK with valid message IDs. All features tested and functional.
passed_tests: Call initiation sends to /tts/3/advanced endpoint and returns 200 OK
SSE events stream correctly during call (Connected to event stream)
Call History panel shows recent calls with status icons and timestamps
Voice Bot Control header displays correctly
All form fields work correctly: Call Type, Voice Model, From/To Number, Recipient Name, Service Name, OTP Digits
Message Scripts textareas (Greetings, Prompt, Retry, End Message) functional
Call Steps Configuration tabs (Step 1, Step 2, Step 3, Accepted, Rejected) clickable
Start Call button initiates call via Infobip API successfully
Hang Up button appears when call is active and terminates call
Backend logs show successful Infobip response with message IDs
Real-time event logging in Bot Logs panel working
Clear Logs functionality working with notification
Dark glassmorphism UI theme implemented correctly
Two-column layout (Bot Logs | Call Setup) working properly
Infobip API polling for status updates working correctly
